 markup to all have the same _meaning_ from one site to the next.

ent that is expecting goodrelations annotations will not be able

ion properly if it receives valid html without the meta-data.

cannot make that need visible the server, or to

to ask for `text/html` and hope that the server
> always sends goodrelation=
s meta-data and that no intermediates strip
> what might seem to be superfl=
uous bloat from the returned

equire that goodrelations

a is, strictly

rks almost all the time. =A0But it does

ple, if some other ontology comes along

ions, the server has to serve

 the time. =A0Or choose to

se support. =A0It cannot

tes that can convert
